alert.note: Alert for Bee; Goliad; Inland Refugio; La Salle; Live Oak; McMullen; Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 6:39PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of La Salle, McMullen, southwestern Victoria, southern Goliad, northwestern Refugio, Live Oak and Bee Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 638 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 6 miles south of Oak Village to 6 miles west of Blanconia to 8 miles southeast of Tilden to 10 miles north of Los Angeles. Movement was south at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Beeville, Cotulla, Refugio, George West, Three Rivers, Woodsboro, Tilden, Choke Canyon, Skidmore, Lake City, Quintana, River Creek Acres, Tynan, Calliham, Gardendale, Annarose, Argenta, Zella, Karon and Mount Lucas. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 57 and 82. Interstate 37 between mile markers 40 and 72. US Highway 281 between mile markers 618 and 650. US Highway 181 between mile markers 582 and 612. US Highway 183 between mile markers 648 and 668. US Highway 59 between mile markers 680 and 746. US Highway 77 between mile markers 586 and 590, and between mile markers 606 and 634. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Bee; Goliad; Inland Refugio; La Salle; Live Oak; McMullen; Victoria
